mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID memberId , NAME name , PASSWORD password , SALT salt , POINT point , MEMBERSHIP membership , GENDER gender , EMAIL email , BIRTH birth FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
SELECT LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND LOGIN_FAIL_TIME + 1/24 >= SYSDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT = LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT + 1 , LOGIN_FAIL_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
